mapper.insert: INSERT INTO estate( occupied_area, lon, lat, pinyin, building_rules, building_name, shopping, area, city, total_number_of_building, infoId, community_introduction, greening_rate, plot_ratio, property_cost, total_number_of_households, detailed_address, developers, property_company, arking_spot, floor_area, building_age, period_int, building_types, id, property_categorproperty_category ) ( #{estate.occupied_area}, #{estate.lon}, #{estate.lat}, #{estate.pinyin}, #{estate.building_rules}, #{estate.building_name}, #{estate.shopping}, #{estate.area}, '武汉', #{estate.total_number_of_building}, #{estate.infoId}, #{estate.community_introduction}, #{estate.greening_rate}, #{estate.plot_ratio}, #{estate.property_cost}, #{estate.total_number_of_households}, #{estate.detailed_address}, #{estate.developers}, #{estate.property_company}, #{estate.arking_spot}, #{estate.floor_area}, #{estate.building_age}, #{estate.period_int}, #{estate.building_types}, REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), #{estate.property_categorproperty_category} )
INSERT INTO images( urls, id, infoId ) ( #{pic.urls}, REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), #{pic.infoId} )
INSERT INTO expert( expert_interpretation, id, infoId ) ( #{expert.expert_interpretation}, REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), #{expert.infoId} )
